name: Embrace of the Dark Fey
source: Legacy of the First World pg. 5
text: The blood of an evil fey ancestor in your veins lends you aggressive, often bloodthirsty impulses that you strive to keep under control.
prerequisites: You must have an evil fey such as a quickling or redcap somewhere in your family line, or you must have the Shameful Heritage background (Ultimate Campaign 40).
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, this bonus increases to +4. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.
special: While a creature is shaken because you have demoralized it using the Intimidate skill, your attacks that deal damage to the creature also deal 1 point of bleed damage. Bleed damage from this ability does not stack with itself.
goal: Demoralize an appropriate number of creatures using the Intimidate skill.
text_zh: 邪恶精类的血脉流淌在你的血管中，让你变得极富攻击性，你拚命地压制那种渴血的冲动。
prerequisites_zh: 你必须在家系中有一位邪恶精类祖先，像是快可灵B2或是红帽子B2，或者你必须拥有耻辱血系背景（Shameful Heritage，极限战役40）。
benefit_zh: 你在威吓检定上获得+2加值。如果你在威吓技能上有10或者更高的等级，这个加值会提升到4。同时你在用于确认重击的攻击骰上获得+2环境加值。
goal_zh: 使用威吓技能挫败一定数量生物的士气。
completionBenefit_zh: 对被你挫败士气陷入战栗的生物造成伤害的攻击同时，会对那个生物造成1点流血伤害。来自这个能力的流血伤害并不会与自身叠加。
